otp.group6.view

Class LoadSelectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.view.LoadSelectionController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LoadSelectionController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Class functions as a controller for the MixerSettingsView.fxml view and is used to load mixer settings either locally or fromt he database
    Author:
    Joonas Soininen

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • setLocalization

        private void setLocalization(java.util.ResourceBundle bundle)
        Method sets all visible text according to the localization settings with the provided parameter.
        Parameters:
        bundle. - is localization data passed trough from the MainController.java

      • setMainController

        public void setMainController(MainController mainController)
        Method sets variable to the parameter provided from MainController.java
        Parameters:
        mainController, - is the instance of MainController.java that is in the current thread running.

      • handleCloseButtonAction

        public void handleCloseButtonAction(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method to close the view when button is pressed
        Parameters:
        event, - handles the on push events of binded buttons

      • loadFromCloud

        public void loadFromCloud()
        Method opens MixerSettingsView.fxml by calling its method from the MainController.java and closes currently visible stage.

      • loadFromLocal

        public void loadFromLocal()
        Method to load mixer settings from the users own computers file system. When loaded it will set the slider values by calling MainController.java method setSliderValues. Also will close the currently open stage.
